short.ar: قم بركلة حرة رائعة فوق الوابل وسجل الأهداف في لعبة كرة القدم هذه.
short.am: በዚህ የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታ ላይ ከፍተኛ ነፃ ምርጫ አድርጉ።
short.bg: Направете страхотен свободен удар над баража и вкарайте голове в този футболен мач.
short.bn: ব্যারেজের উপর দুর্দান্ত ফ্রিকিক তৈরি করুন এবং এই ফুটবল গেমটিতে গোল করুন।
short.ca: Feu un gran freekick sobre la barraca i marqueu gols en aquest partit de futbol.
short.cs: Udělej skvělý volný kop přes baráž a vstřel góly v této fotbalové hře.
short.da: Lav godt frispark over spærreilden og scor mål i denne fodboldkamp.
short.de: Machen Sie einen tollen Freistoß über das Sperrfeuer und schießen Sie Tore in diesem Fußballspiel.
short.el: Κάντε σπουδαίο φάουλ πάνω από το μπαράζ και βάλλετε γκολ σε αυτό το παιχνίδι ποδοσφαίρου.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Make great freekick over the barrage and score goals in this soccer game.
short.es: Haz un gran tiro libre sobre el aluvión y marca goles en este juego de fútbol.
short.et: Tehke selles jalgpallimängus suurepärane vabalöök üle paisu ja lööge väravaid.
short.fa: freekick بزرگ بیش از رگبار و گل نمره در این بازی فوتبال.
short.fi: Tee loistava vapaapotku padon yli ja tee maaleja tässä jalkapallo-ottelussa.
short.fil: Gumawa ng mahusay na freekick sa ibabaw ng barrage at puntos layunin sa soccer laro na ito.
short.fr: Faites un excellent coup franc au-dessus du barrage et marquez des buts dans ce match de football.
short.gu: બેરેજ પર મહાન ફ્રીકિક બનાવો અને આ સોકર રમતમાં ગોલ કરો.
short.he: לעשות freekick נהדר מעל המטח ולהבקיע שערים במשחק כדורגל זה.
short.hi: बैराज पर महान फ्रीकिक बनाएं और इस फुटबॉल खेल में गोल करें।
short.hr: Napravite veliki freekick preko baraža i zabiti golove u ovoj nogometnoj utakmici.
short.hu: Csinálj nagyszerű szabadrúgást a gáton, és lőj gólokat ezen a focimeccsen.
short.id: Buat freekick hebat di atas rentetan dan cetak gol dalam pertandingan sepak bola ini.
short.it: Fai grandi calci di punizione sopra la raffica e segna gol in questa partita di calcio.
short.ja: このサッカーゲームで弾幕を越えて素晴らしいフリーキックを作り、ゴールを決めましょう。
short.kn: ಬ್ಯಾರೇಜ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಉತ್ತಮ ಫ್ರೀ ಕಿಕ್ ಮಾಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ಈ ಸಾಕರ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಗೋಲುಗಳನ್ನು ಸ್ಕೋರ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
short.ko: 이 축구 경기에서 공세를 통해 훌륭한 프리킥을 만들고 골을 넣으십시오.
short.lv: Izveidojiet lielisku freekick pār aizsprostu un gūstiet vārtus šajā futbola spēlē.
short.ml: ബാരേജിന് മുകളിലൂടെ മികച്ച ഫ്രീകിക്ക് ഉണ്ടാക്കുകയും ഈ സോക്കർ ഗെയിമിൽ ഗോളുകൾ സ്കോർ ചെയ്യുകയും ചെയ്യുക.
short.mr: बॅरेजवर उत्कृष्ट फ्रीकिक बनवा आणि या फुटबॉल गेममध्ये गोल करा.
short.ms: Buat freekick yang hebat di atas barrage dan menjaringkan gol dalam permainan bola sepak ini.
short.nl: Maak geweldige freekick over het spervuur en scoor doelpunten in dit voetbalspel.
short.no: Gjør gode frispark over sperren og score mål i denne fotballkampen.
short.pl: Wykonuj świetny rzut wolny nad zaporą i strzelaj gole w tym meczu piłki nożnej.
short.ro: Face freekick mare peste baraj și înscrie goluri în acest joc de fotbal.
short.ru: Сделайте отличный штрафной удар над шквалом и забивайте голы в этом футбольном матче.
short.sk: Urobte skvelý freekick cez priehradu a strieľajte góly v tomto futbalovom zápase.
short.sl: Naredite velik freekick nad baraža in zadetek golov v tej nogometni tekmi.
short.sv: Gör bra frispark över spärren och gör mål i den här fotbollsmatchen.
short.sw: Fanya freekick kubwa juu ya barrage na kufunga mabao katika mchezo huu wa soka.
short.ta: இந்த கால்பந்து விளையாட்டில் பெரும் ஃப்ரீகிக்கை உருவாக்கி கோல்களை அடிக்கவும்.
short.te: ఈ సాకర్ ఆటలో బ్యారేజ్ పై గొప్ప ఫ్రీకిక్ చేయండి మరియు గోల్స్ సాధించండి.
short.th: ทําฟรีคิกที่ยอดเยี่ยมเหนือเขื่อนกั้นน้ําและทําประตูในเกมฟุตบอลนี้
short.tr: Barajın üzerinden harika bir serbest vuruş yapın ve bu futbol oyununda gol atın.
short.uk: Зробіть чудовий штрафний майданчик над шквалом і забивайте голи в цьому футбольному матчі.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Among football games, freekick soccer is very common. You have to shoot and score goals while the Football player builds a barrage. Thus, players can display their skills to stand out in the football challenge. When you freekick, you must spin the ball and shoot your shot. It would help if you made good moves while shooting free kicks against your tough opponents in Football tournament mode. You must be the best soccer star by collecting points when the tournament is over. You have to put up a good fight against tough soccer champs.

Soccer games contain many features while playing. In particular, the football player offers different elements to the users among the games played. There are three different football game modes in the game. Each soccer game mod has a different effect on other users or devices. Among these modes, there is also the freekick game mode. You should take your place among these soccer champs.

You can shoot and train without limits in this football challenge 1vs1 mode. While the football game tournaments are held, the levels are skipped quickly in the free-kick sections. Another feature is the change pos feature. The soccer player can adjust the shooting position and score better goals with this feature. By adjusting all these, free-kick football can be played at different levels, such as manageable, challenging, and medium levels. The game flows quickly and allows you to spend time in a more fun soccer game.

How To Play
It is played with mouse.

Strike Football Sports Game Features
✓ Realistic shader
✓ Advanced control
✓ 3D level designer
✓ 3D environment

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
